body: The art is good. But the lack of anal scene and censorship makes me feel like fapping to a fucking black paper
first time im glad to be able to read chinese here
The cover is pretty beautiful tho
Oh, basically it's like a Turkish soap opera story with a trap (?). Thanks for the translation :)

In case any one dont get the chinese, here's the basic story:
---the old papa was scared cause he let the daughter ran away from the wedding, the husband is the son of a powerful rich family
so the younger brother has to replace his sister, and they are afraid that when husband find out, the poor family will get killed,so he hide a knife, ready to kill the rich husband and ran away too
but the husband seems to be fine with that, and then it's the hentai stuff yall know
at last the husband tells the truth, that when they were kids,  an accident happened and the rich son got onto a coma for days, everyone thought that sice that the rich son knew and liked the sister.  But Actually what he saw at that magical moment is the younger brother, who looked totally the same as sister, and he's who he really wants.
So the rich son sets up the entire wedding thing, cause he knows that the papa will let the sister ran away and the brother will sacrifice himself for his sister
PLAN WORKS WELL.
b
@zurka same man. If only this gets translated and decensored...
This is too cute and gay. I don't fav only because of the censorship and because I don't understand anything
